import axios from"axios";var service=axios.create({baseURL:process.env.REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL,withCredentials:true// Cookie is sent to client when using this service. (used for session)
});function errorHandler(error){if(error.response.data){console.log(error.response&&error.response.data);throw error;}throw error;}export default{service:service,signup:function signup(userInfo){return service.post("/api/auth/signup",userInfo).then(function(res){return res.data;}).catch(errorHandler);},signin:function signin(userInfo){return service.post("/api/auth/signin",userInfo).then(function(res){return res.data;}).catch(errorHandler);},isLoggedIn:function isLoggedIn(){return service.get("/api/auth/isLoggedIn").then(function(res){return res.data;}).catch(errorHandler);},logout:function logout(){return service.get("/api/auth/logout").then(function(res){return res.data;}).catch(errorHandler);},getAnnounce:function getAnnounce(){return service.get("/api/announce").then(function(res){return res.data;}).catch(errorHandler);},getOneAnnounce:function getOneAnnounce(announceId){return service.get("/api/announce/".concat(announceId)).then(function(res){return res.data;}).catch(errorHandler);},addAnnounce:function addAnnounce(data){return service.post("/api/announce",data).then(function(res){return res.data;}).catch(errorHandler);},updateAnnounce:function updateAnnounce(announceId,data){return service.patch("/api/announce/".concat(announceId),data).then(function(res){return res.data;}).catch(errorHandler);},updateUser:function updateUser(data){return service.patch("/api/users/me",data).then(function(res){return res.data;}).catch(errorHandler);},getUserAnnounce:function getUserAnnounce(){return service.get("/api/users/me/announce").then(function(res){return res.data;}).catch(errorHandler);},removeAnnounce:function removeAnnounce(announceId){return service.delete("/api/announce/".concat(announceId)).then(function(res){return res.data;}).catch(errorHandler);},getUserInfos:function getUserInfos(){return service.get("/api/users/me").then(function(res){return res.data;}).catch(errorHandler);}};
